name: Shackled (itch) (Whalics)
description:
You've been sentenced to prison for your crimes, but might have a chance at escape. Interdimensional portals have opened up in an adjacent cell... Which path will you choose, and how will you deal with the consequences?

Each dimension features a unique enemy, objective, and weapon!

Made in 10 days for the SGDA Fall 2022 Game Jam 2.

Mikey Bess - Generalist, Underbelly level

Ian Percy - Generalist, Labyrinth level

Controls:

- WASD to move

- M1 or left click to shoot

Assets:

Underbelly music from Pixabay (we didn't have Ian G. to make it)

EZ Camera Shake by Anderson Ado
